Nuls.ac_addAddressPrefix.MethodDescription: 添加地址前缀,链管理模块会调用该接口

Nuls.ac_createOfflineAccount.MethodDescription: 创建离线账户, 该账户不保存到数据库, 并将直接返回账户的所有信息/create an offline account, which is not saved to the database and will directly return all information to the account.

Nuls.ac_getAccountList.MethodDescription: 获取所有账户集合,并放入缓存/query all account collections and put them in cache

Nuls.ac_getAddressList.MethodDescription: 分页查询账户地址列表/Paging query account address list

Nuls.ac_getAliasByAddress.MethodDescription: 根据地址获取别名/get the alias by address

Nuls.ac_getAllAddressPrefix.MethodDescription: 获取所有链的地址前缀

Nuls.ac_getAllPriKey.MethodDescription: 获取所有本地账户账户私钥，必须保证所有账户密码一致，如果本地账户中的密码不一致，将返回错误信息/Get the all local private keys. if the password in the local account is different, the error message will be returned.

Nuls.ac_getEncryptedAddressList.MethodDescription: 获取本地加密账户列表/Get a list of locally encrypted accounts

Nuls.ac_getMultiSignAccount.MethodDescription: 根据多签账户地址获取完整多签账户/Search for multi-signature account by address

Nuls.ac_getPubKey.MethodDescription: 根据账户地址和密码,查询账户公钥/Get the account's public key

Nuls.ac_importAccountByKeystore.MethodDescription: 根据AccountKeyStore导入账户/Import accounts by AccountKeyStore

Nuls.ac_importAccountByPriKey.MethodDescription: 根据私钥导入账户/Import accounts by private key

Nuls.ac_isAliasUsable.MethodDescription: 检查别名是否可用/check whether the account is usable

Nuls.ac_isMultiSignAccountBuilder.MethodDescription: 验证是否多签账户的创建者之一/Whether it is multiSign account Builder

Nuls.ac_removeAccount.MethodDescription: 移除指定账户/Remove specified account

Nuls.ac_removeMultiSignAccount.MethodDescription: 移除多签账户/remove the multi sign account

Nuls.ac_setMultiSignAlias.MethodDescription: 设置多签账户别名/set the alias of multi sign account

Nuls.ac_setRemark.MethodDescription: 为账户设置备注/Set remark for accounts

Nuls.ac_signBlockDigest.MethodDescription: 区块数据摘要签名/Block data digest signature

Nuls.ac_signMultiSignTransaction.MethodDescription: 多签交易签名/sign MultiSign Transaction

Nuls.ac_transfer.MethodDescription: 创建普通转账交易/create transfer transaction

Nuls.ac_updateOfflineAccountPassword.MethodDescription: 离线账户修改密码/Offline account change password

Nuls.ac_updatePassword.MethodDescription: 根据原密码修改账户密码/Modify the account password by the original password

Nuls.ac_validationPassword.MethodDescription: 验证账户密码是否正确/Verify that the account password is correct

Nuls.ac_verifySignData.MethodDescription: 验证数据签名/Verification Data Signature

Nuls.sc_batch_end.MethodDescription: 通知当前批次结束并返回结果/batch end

Nuls.sc_imputed_create_gas.MethodDescription: 预估发布合约消耗的GAS/imputed create gas

Nuls.sc_initial_account_token.MethodDescription: 初始化账户token信息，节点导入账户时调用/initial account token

Nuls.sc_invoke_contract.MethodDescription: 批次通知开始后，一笔一笔执行合约/invoke contract one by one

Nuls.sc_package_batch_end.MethodDescription: 打包结束 - 通知当前批次结束并返回结果/batch end

Nuls.sc_register_cmd_for_contract.MethodDescription: 其他模块向合约模块注册可被合约调用的命令，注册后，可在合约代码内调用注册的命令/register cmd for contract

Nuls.sc_transfer.MethodDescription: 从账户地址向合约地址转账(主链资产)/transfer NULS from sender to contract address

共识奖励收益地址是合约地址时，会触发合约的_payable(String[][] args)方法，参数是节点收益地址明细
args[0] = new String[]{address, amount}
...
/trigger payable for consensus contract

Nuls.sc_validate_create.MethodDescription: 验证发布合约/validate create contract

Nuls.tx_packableTxs.MethodDescription: 获取可打包的交易集/returns a list of packaged transactions

Nuls.updateChainAsset.MethodDescription: 查询更新流通资产信息

Nulstar.scanmanagedmodules.MethodDescription: Searches and reads the configuration file Module.ncf in the directory hierarchy.

Nulstar.startallmodules.MethodDescription: Starts modules of the desired namespace, if blank then all available modules are started.

Nulstar.stopallmodules.MethodDescription: Stops all modules belonging to the specified namespace, if blank it stops all modules that are currently running.
